Class Rules

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rules

  • public class Rules
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Rules: Acts as the Rules object for a game of yahtzee. Attributes: int rolls int handSize int sides YahtzeeGUI game; JFrame f; publicMethods: setGUIRules() getSides() getHandSize() getRolls()
    Version:
    v3.0 03/23/21
    Author:
    Adam Kowalchyk
    See Also:
    "No Borrowed Code"
